snippet.title: [ Library of Ruina ] Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Library Battle Simulation

2020 on Steam

I hope you can find your book.


*본 영상은 한국어로 만들어졌습니다.

*각 언어로 자유롭게 번역해주시면 감사드리겠습니다.

*This video is made in Korean.

*We would appreciate it if you could translate freely into each language.
